title: View a Visual Graph of the Repository
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the Git log command with various options to visualize the history of a Git repository, including viewing a graph of all commits and branches.

meta.title: Visualize Git Repository History with a Graph
meta.description: Discover how to use the Git log command with the --graph option to view a visual graph of a repository's commit history and branch structure.
meta.keywords: version control, repository, git labs, visualization, graph, git, git playground

steps.title: View a Visual Graph of the Repository

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看仓库的可视化图形
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何使用带有各种选项的Git log命令来可视化Git仓库的历史记录，包括查看所有提交和分支的图形。

meta.title: 用图形可视化Git仓库历史
meta.description: 探索如何使用带有--graph选项的Git log命令来查看仓库提交历史和分支结构的可视化图形。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 仓库, Git实验, 可视化, 图形, Git, Git游乐场
